The exceptional comfort of reading: thanks to the 6-inch touch screen with E Ink Carta technology, you can enjoy eye-safe and comfortable reading anywhere. The screen’s optical characteristics are close to ordinary paper, so it does not glare in the sun and does not tire your eyes.
Read in any lighting: with PocketBook Basic Lux 4, you can enjoy an exciting book anywhere and anytime, regardless of the lighting. Just turn on the front light and read even in total darkness.
Wi-Fi, Cloud services & free dictionarie: use Wi-Fi for online shopping in any online store, operate your library and synchronize your books with other devices via PocketBook Cloud and Dropbox. Read and learn more productively thanks to 11 preloaded dictionaries and additional 42 free language combinations.
Create your huge library: Basic Lux 4 supports 25 formats including the most popular: ACSM, AZW, CBZ, DJVU, DOC, EPUB, FB2, PDF, TXT, JPEG, and PNG. The device has enough space to store all your books: in addition to the built-in memory of 8 GB, the e-reader has a slot for memory cards.
Super handy & lightweight: the device is highly compact and user-friendly, as it weighs only 155 g, fits easily in any bag, and is equipped with a touchscreen and mechanical buttons for control and page-turning.
Up to a month without recharging: enjoy unlimited reading with the energy-efficient Basic Lux 4! One full charge of the device provides up to a month of active reading.
